mapper.sql: id, Ltime, storedef_id, billno, stackerid, work_type, palletid, aisle, slayer, srank, srow, taisle, tlayer, trank, trow, status, stationid, workindx, xpalletid, deal_time, orderid, send_time, create_time, creator, work_id
mapper.select: select w.* ,sd.storedef_code,sd.storedef_name,p.* from t_asrs_workflow w left join t_asrs_sys_storedef sd on w.storedef_id = sd.id left join t_web_project p on w.projectid=p.id where w.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into t_asrs_workflow (id, Ltime, storedef_id, billno, stackerid, work_type, palletid, aisle, slayer, srank, srow, taisle, tlayer, trank, trow, status, stationid, workindx, xpalletid, deal_time, orderid, send_time, create_time, creator, work_id,companyid,projectid) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{storedefId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{billno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stackerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{palletid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aisle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{slayer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{srank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{srow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taisle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tlayer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workindx,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{xpalletid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update t_asrs_workflow
Ltime = #{ltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
storedef_id = #{storedefId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
billno = #{billno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stackerid = #{stackerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_type = #{workType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
palletid = #{palletid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
aisle = #{aisle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
slayer = #{slayer,jdbcType=INTEGER},
srank = #{srank,jdbcType=INTEGER},
srow = #{srow,jdbcType=INTEGER},

tlayer = #{tlayer,jdbcType=INTEGER},
trank = #{trank,jdbcType=INTEGER},
trow = #{trow,jdbcType=INTEGER},

work_id = #{workId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
companyid = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
projectid = #{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_asrs_workflow set Ltime = #{ltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, storedef_id = #{storedefId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, billno = #{billno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stackerid = #{stackerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_type = #{workType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, palletid = #{palletid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aisle = #{aisle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, slayer = #{slayer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, srank = #{srank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, srow = #{srow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, taisle = #{taisle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tlayer = #{tlayer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trank = #{trank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trow = #{trow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stationid = #{stationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workindx = #{workindx,jdbcType=BIGINT}, xpalletid = #{xpalletid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deal_time = #{dealTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, orderid = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_id = #{workId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, companyid = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, projectid = #{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
